For those curious: the number of Ms and ds specifies the minimum number of digits, any number of digits less than the amount of Ms or ds will be left zero-padded. So in this particular case, Oct, Nov, Dec will be two digits. And days with a single digit will be single digit. Source: docs.oracle.com/javase/7/docs/api/java/text/â€¦
